titleStmt.title: A challenge for beautie· as it hath beene sundry times acted, by the Kings Majesties Servants: at the Blacke-friers, and at the Globe on the Banke-side. Written by Thomas Heywood.
titleStmt.author: Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Raworth, and are to bee sold by Iames Becket, at his shop in the Inner Temple Gate,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A chalenge for beauty.
Quires A, H, and sometimes I have vertical chain lines.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in the Inner Temple Gate
